news.title: 美伊若开战，七种可能场景
news.title0: What could happen if the US strikes Iran? Here are seven scenarios
news.content: 美国或在数日内打击伊朗。分析预测了从有限空袭到政权更迭、地区冲突升级等七种潜在后果。
news.content0: The US appears poised to strike Iran within days.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美边境人员涉致命枪击案被停职
news.title0: Border agents involved in fatal shooting of Alex Pretti placed on leave
news.content: 美国海关与边境保护局两名涉枪杀明尼阿波利斯市民的探员已被行政停职，事件引发全国抗议。
news.content0: US Customs and Border Protection (CBP) says two agents involved in the fatal shooting of an American citizen in Minneapolis have been placed on administrative leave.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 传奇教练贝利奇克跌落神坛
news.title0: Bill Belichick: A Super Bowl god's fall from grace
news.content: NFL史上最伟大教练贝利奇克转战大学联赛后战绩惨淡，落选名人堂，传奇生涯蒙上阴影。
news.content0: While the New England Patriots prepare for their 12th Super Bowl appearance, their former head coach Bill Belichick - widely considered to be the greatest professional football coach of all time - finds himself in an unlikely position: defending his legacy.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特斯拉年收入首降，转向AI与机器人
news.title0: Tesla cuts car models in shift to robots and AI
news.content: 特斯拉2025年营收首次下滑，宣布停产Model S和X，将工厂转产人形机器人，并投资马斯克的AI公司。
news.content0: Tesla says its annual revenue has fallen for the first time as the electric vehicle (EV) maker shifts its focus to artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 抗议者聚集德州拘留中心要求释放5岁童
news.title0: Protesters and lawmakers gather outside Texas facility where Minneapolis child is held
news.content: 抗议者与州警在德州拘留中心外冲突，要求释放被移民局扣押的5岁儿童及其父亲，多名议员到场声援。
news.content0: Protesters clashed with state troopers on Wednesday outside a Texas detention centre where a pre-schooler and his father are being held after immigration officers took them into custody in Minnesota last week.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美拟要求旅客提供社媒信息，旅游业警告将损失巨大
news.title0: Millions of travelers could skip visiting the US if proposed social media policy is implemented, industry experts warn
news.content: 美国拟要求免签计划旅客提交社媒账户信息，旅游业警告此举或致470万旅客流失，损失157亿美元消费。
news.content0: Ahead of a proposed rule change that would require social media account information from some foreign travelers to the United States, international travel experts are saying the policy could further deter visitors from coming to the US — a decline that could translate into billions of dollars in lost revenue for the travel sector.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 贝索斯夫妇高调亮相巴黎时装周
news.title0: Lauren Sanchez Bezos and Jeff Bezos are now fashion insiders
news.content: 杰夫·贝索斯与妻子劳伦高调现身巴黎高定时装周前排看秀，与设计师合影，跻身时尚界焦点。
news.content0: The most notable attendees at the same Paris Couture Week that included Rihanna, Teyana Taylor, Demi Moore and Jennifer Lawrence as guests were not musicians or award-winning actors. They were – well, what to call Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez Bezos? “Billionaires” does not encapsulate their unprecedented reach – rarely are such wealthy figures so eager to play out with their spoils in the spotlight. Are they patrons, as the lead sponsors of this year’s Met Gala? Socialites? Titans of industry who have now set their sights on pop cultural saturation?
news.author: CNN

news.title: 炸弹气旋将再袭美国东南部
news.title0: Bomb cyclone to bring major winter storm to the Southeast. Northeast could see a glancing blow or a lot of snow
news.content: 一个快速增强的风暴预计周末在东南沿海形成炸弹气旋，为卡罗来纳州等地带来大雪和强风。
news.content0: A rapidly strengthening storm is expected to develop off the Southeast coast this weekend amid adeadly cold outbreak, bringing a high likelihood of snow and strong winds to parts of the Carolinas and southern Virginia - just days after ahistoric winter stormblasted large parts of the East Coast.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 门将压哨头球绝杀，本菲卡送皇马进欧冠附加赛
news.title0: Dramatic, last-gasp header by a goalkeeper caps a climactic Champions League opening round
news.content: 欧冠小组赛末轮，本菲卡门将特鲁宾补时头球绝杀，助球队晋级并将皇马踢入资格赛，卫冕冠军巴黎亦出局。
news.content0: Real Madridwas stunningly dumped into the qualifying playoffs of theChampions Leagueby its former coach José Mourinho — whoseBenficateam advanced on a last-gasp goal by its goalkeeper — on Wednesday and will be joined there by title holder Paris Saint-Germain.
news.author: CNN
